metric_description: Count of all reportable perm employees
sql: SELECT count(*) AS metric_output FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.reportable_perm_employees` WHERE partition_dt = {run_date}

metric_description: Count of all reportable non perm employees
sql: SELECT count(*) AS metric_output FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.reportable_non_perm_employees` WHERE partition_dt = {run_date}

SELECT COUNTIF(gender = 'Female') AS numerator_value, COUNT(*) AS denominator_value, ROUND(COUNTIF(gender = 'Female') * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2) AS metric_output FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.reportable_perm_employees` WHERE partition_dt = {run_date}

metric_description: Percentage of permanent employees among total employees
sql: WITH perm_count AS (SELECT COUNT(*) AS perm_total FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.reportable_perm_employees` WHERE partition_dt = {run_date}), non_perm_count AS (SELECT COUNT(*) AS non_perm_total FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.reportable_non_perm_employees` WHERE partition_dt = {run_date}) SELECT perm_total AS numerator_value, perm_total + non_perm_total AS denominator_value, ROUND(perm_total * 100.0 / (perm_total + non_perm_total), 2) AS metric_output FROM perm_count, non_perm_count
